data.text:
@atpower111 NZ is off the charts💔Jacinda must be thrilled🙄and they’re 97% jabbed. They’re heading into their fall/winter.
Expect a return of restrictions here by fall☹️
@howisthismylif This was presented at the last OPH public meeting to the entire board. There were few to no counter claims.
@howisthismylif I rewrote my will. I'm expecting to drop dead at any moment after 24 days.
@howisthismylif Well my wife and I went to Ottawa. We drove in a convoy in hamilton, and london the other day, large groups, bbq didn’t get sick..we had fun :)
